version_description: New rewards & offers for Cleo+ subscribers are on their way. Watch this space for more details to follow! Fixed a bug causing the app to crash when editing a future bill's expected amount, and a couple of other minor fixes.

We've built an app, and now it's (if you can imagine such a thing) better, faster, stronger.

Share with friends, acquaintances, whoever, and you'll get bumped up the waitlist and into the app. Experience Cleo as it's meant to be experienced, outside of the confines of FB messenger.

The waitlist's reign of terror is over!

We've worked hard to further stabilise the app. To celebrate, we had a quiet word with the waitlist, who left without too much fuss. We've also fixed up bills within the dashboard, swipe left and manage the living heck out of your finances.

We are excited to announce you can now view and track your Wallet transactions within the app chat! Simply say "Wallet" to Cleo for a detailed overview on your savings.
We have also added message templates to make it easier for you to talk to Cleo!
In addition, we have improved performance across the app, made design changes around the dashboard and improved the login experience.

Cleo will now show you your running balance over time in the dashboard! Your running balance chart is updated daily based on your spendings and helps you better understand how you use your money. Other chunky features include pull to refresh, a transaction list performance overhaul and a satisfying list of expelled bugs.
We've updated the Discover Cleo section (far right tab) to show you more things you can say to Cleo based on features you use. Also ticked off a few bugs & various minor improvements.
For new app users we've improved how you register and login to the app, and elsewhere we've sped things up behind the scenes. Your app should feel snappier than ever.
Small update this week with various behind-the-scene improvements

New rewards & offers for Cleo+ subscribers are on their way. Watch this space for more details to follow! Fixed a bug causing the app to crash when editing a future bill's expected amount, and a couple of other minor fixes.
We've improved rewards for Cleo+ subscribers, giving you more ways to get a little back. Not a Cleo+ subscriber? Don't worry, we've also included a few bug fixes.

- Cleo Wallet is now native to the app - so you can put aside money beautifully and easily.
- Feature release: cashback on your spending. We're calling it Daily Cash.
- New dashboard designs, and improvements to navigation.
- Fixed some bugs! Standard.

- New and improved Discover page so you can track your vital signs easily, including how much cashback you’ve earned
- Improvements to the look and feel of your Cleo Wallet
- Simpler, cleaner transaction lists across the app
- Squashed a good few bugs, as per

- Redesigned dashboard let’s you see your spending & saving
- NEW: Tell Cleo your goals & she'll help you save towards them. Everything from a rainy day to making it rain
- A few bug fixes and optimisations, subtly improving to your Cleo app!

We've been busy! 
- Fortune teller mode! Gaze into the future of your finances
- Stories! Regular useful Cleo how-tos delivered direct to the app
- The usual glut of bug fixes

- We've improved autosaving
- Grinch mode! 
- The usual smorgasbord of bug fixes

- 2020 is nigh, how was your financial 2019? Big tings with Toast mode!
- Story mode is bigger and better than ever
- Bug fixes. Standard.

- A few UI tweaks here and there, making your Cleo experience just that little bit better
- Your credit score is coming to the app soon! We'll help you work that rating up
- Autosaving is better and easier than ever, put aside some cash for that next big purchase

- Check your credit score! We'll help you get that rating up
- Various fixes and tweaks
- A few behind the scenes improvements

- Improved savings goals! Customize your goal with a motivational image to help you smash that target
- We've made a bunch of behind the scenes improvements, your app should be smoother and faster than ever

- Improved savings goals! Customize your goal with a motivational image to help you smash that target
- We've made a bunch of behind the scenes improvements, your app should be smoother and faster than ever
- The usual, a few behind the scenes improvements and optimizations

- Add a bit of personality to your spending categories with emojis
- As per usual, a few behind the scenes improvements
- We've made the Cleo app even more attractive, and included the usual glut of fixes and improvements
- The usual, a few behind the scenes improvements and optimisations
We've fixed some things and we've tweaked some things. Thanks again for using Cleo!
We've improved our weekly budgeting tool so it's easier to keep an eye on your cash, and also fixed a few bugs along the way.
We've improved Cleo Stories and included the usual bunch of bug fixes.

- Savings Goals has been overhauled, making it even easier for you to smash those targets
- We've improved Budget
- The usual glut of bug fixes

- Custom categories has been improved. Set a colour, set an emoji and get organised!
- Fixed a few bugs

- We've updated the dashboard making your finances easier to manage
- Fixed a few bugs you might've been experiencing with budget
- Improvements, bug fixes and a general tidy up of categories and budget
- The usual bug fixes and improvements, and we've made categories and budget even better
We've made some minor tweaks to the chat experience & fixed some budgeting bugs
Tiny update to make long lists of quick replies easier to navigate
We've improved sign-up, we've crushed bugs. Cleo is looking better than ever!
Faster loading of GIFs
Made it easier to register and sign in and fixed some bugs in chat
The usual glut of bug fixes, and we've improved bank connect and the right hand tab
We've improved the overall performance of the app
You can now edit custom categories for your spending
We've improved bill & income detection so Cleo is more accurate when talking to you about your budget
We've improved bank connect, fixed bugs and made registration easier
We've taught Cleo to automatically detect your bills better
Cleo's getting an updated look, but she's still her sassy self.
We've simplified connecting your bank and fixed a serious amount of bugs
Find out your financial health score, and the usual bunch of bug fixes and improvements
Find out your financial health score, and the usual bunch of bug fixes and improvements
We're continuing to make improvements to our budget and wallet, helping you get on top of your money
Salvage your finances with our new and improved budget feature!
Improved login flow and improved performance.
We've made it even easier to budget, as well as various bug fixes and tweaks
Browse historical budgets
Budget improvements
We've made it easier to tweak your income, we've improved budget, and we've fixed bugs
